jobs_results.title: Android Engineer (Platform Team)
jobs_results.description:
, Limassol

We're seeking an Android Developer, who will expand the product metrics linked to the increased number of transactions in the app. The team is made up of Android, iOS and backend developers, QA testers, UX/UI designers, and data analysts.

Responsibilities
‚Ä¢ Develop and maintain Android applications
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with cross-functional teams on feature design, system architecture, and shipping new features
‚Ä¢ Identify and fix bugs and performance bottlenecks
‚Ä¢ Ensure code quality through unit testing and code reviews
‚Ä¢ Participate in sprint planning and task decomposition processes
‚Ä¢ Stay updated with the latest Android development trends and best practice

Qualifications
‚Ä¢ 3+ years in commercial Android app development.
‚Ä¢ Experience with flutter.
‚Ä¢ Strong knowledge of Java and Kotlin with proficiency in the Android SDK, frameworks, and design principles
‚Ä¢ Ability to write maintainable and testable code, including proficiency in writing unit and UI tests
‚Ä¢ Solid understanding of OOP, SOLID principles, and design patterns
‚Ä¢ Experience with RESTful APIs, third-party libraries, and cloud message APIs including push notifications
‚Ä¢ BS/MS in Computer Science or a related field

Conditions & Benefits
‚Ä¢ Stable salary, official employment
‚Ä¢ Health insurance
‚Ä¢ Hybrid work mode and flexible schedule
‚Ä¢ Relocation package offered for candidates from other regions
‚Ä¢ Access to professional counseling services including psychological, financial, and legal support
‚Ä¢ Discount club membership
‚Ä¢ Diverse internal training programs
‚Ä¢ Partially or fully paid additional training courses
‚Ä¢ All necessary work equipment

jobs_results.title: Mobile / Flutter Developer
jobs_results.description:
Full Time

Athens, Greece

We are looking for a talented Mobile/Flutter Developer with 1-3 years of experience to join the Software Development department of Konnektable Technologies Ltd., Athens, Greece.

The successful candidate will be responsible for developing and maintaining high-quality mobile applications using Flutter. He should be able to write clean, well-documented code and have a good understanding of design principles. He should also be comfortable with debugging and troubleshooting mobile applications.

The ideal candidate should have a strong knowledge of the Flutter framework, Dart language, and the Android and iOS platforms. He should also have a strong understanding of the latest trends and best practices and be able to work well with other developers.

Job Responsibilities

‚Äì Design and build advanced applications for the Android and iOS platforms using Flutter.

‚Äì Be responsible for shipping cross-platform applications for Android and iOS.

‚Äì Develop clean, readable code and design software applications based on user specifications.

‚Äì Stay always up to date on Play/App store requirements and mobile application capabilities and trends to be able to help inform Product teams on possible roadmap features, including implementation breakdowns and prototypes.

‚Äì Collaborate with our user experience (UI/UX) team and our designers to identify and solve key usability challenges for multiple applications.

‚Äì Actively work with our backend team to define and implement APIs and rule sets for data access.

Requirements

‚Äì You have 1+ years of experience in building mobile applications.

‚Äì Flutter development experience.

‚Äì You have experience in publishing and managing mobile apps in the Apple App Store/Google Play Store.

‚Äì You have a strong understanding of UI/UX principles and a critical, detail-oriented eye for design and mobile UIs.

‚Äì You have the ability to analyze problems and implement solutions that trade off architectural, usability, performance, reliability, scalability, level-of-effort, and time-to-market.

‚Äì Good knowledge of REST API services.

‚Äì Experience using version control systems such as Git.

‚Äì Eye for detail.

‚Äì Highly-motivational.

‚Äì Continuous Learning Mindset.

‚Äì Fluent in English, both oral and written.

Good to have

‚Äì Experience with BloC pattern when developing flutter applications.

‚Äì Basic understanding of React.js

Benefits

‚Äì Flexible working hours.

‚Äì Flexible location.

‚Äì Continuous learning.

‚Äì Career growth opportunities.

‚Äì International working environment.

‚Äì An attractive remuneration package.

‚Äì Broad project variety and possible mobility between projects over time.

Evaluation Method

Konnektable will assess candidate suitability using the following criteria:

‚Äì Initial shortlisting based on evaluation of CV.

‚Äì Skype Interview.

‚Äì Test assignment & evaluation.

‚Äì In-Person Interview.

If you are an experienced Flutter developer who is looking for a challenging and rewarding opportunity, please apply today!

Applicants should submit a letter of interest and resume at info@konnektable.com

Apply Now

Want to Join Our Successful Team?

We are always interested to meet potential team members to join our fast-growing, dynamic team of professionals.

Get in Touch Now!

jobs_results.title: Middle/Senior Mobile Flutter Software Engineers
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Europe, Belarus, Poland, Kazakhstan

We are looking for experienced Middle/Senior Mobile Flutter Software Engineers to join our core product ‚Äì BOSS Revolution.

You have a chance to work with a team of outstanding professionals on a challenging product.

You will never be bored‚Äîour team is dynamic, as are our products. Be ready to face thrilling professional challenges and use your strong hard and soft skills to solve them as a Team player.

Your primary responsibility is end-to-end development and support of our user experience in our customer-facing apps.

Join us if you want to:
‚Ä¢ Have a unique work experience with a really strong engineering team!
‚Ä¢ Become a part of a multinational and cross-functional team.
‚Ä¢ Boost your career with a big international product company and have new growth opportunities.
‚Ä¢ Work on new innovative features and bug fixes in a Scrum Team.
‚Ä¢ Take responsibility for the full software development life-cycle.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with business stakeholders and be a part of the product development team.
‚Ä¢ Demonstrate your technology-agnostic positive attitude with the ability to learn and desire to implement solutions using various technologies.
‚Ä¢ Work on high-performing, mission-critical, scalable, and resilient applications and services.
‚Ä¢ Drive aggressive technical debt reduction in close collaboration with developers and automation test engineers.
Join us, if you have:
‚Ä¢ Have around one year of Flutter cross-platform development experience.
‚Ä¢ Have 5+ years of hands-on mobile development experience (Android and/or iOS).
‚Ä¢ Are truly passionate about mobile development.
‚Ä¢ Can communicate in English (B2+).
‚Ä¢ Are a constant learner.
You can please us with:
‚Ä¢ Experience in configuring mobile CI pipelines.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge and experience beyond mobile stack.
We offer you:
‚Ä¢ An exciting and challenging job with talented people around.
‚Ä¢ Really good hardware (a laptop with 32 GB RAM and 512 GB SSD).
‚Ä¢ Competitive salary and growth opportunities.
‚Ä¢ Remote work opportunity (with the opportunity to work from offices in Minsk and Warsaw).
‚Ä¢ Superb English lessons.A few words about us:

IDT Corporation is a global communications company founded in 1990 and headquartered in Newark, New Jersey. We are industry leaders in prepaid communication and payment services and one of the largest international voice carriers. We are listed on the NYSE, employ over 1800 people across 20 countries, and have over $1.5 billion in revenues.

We are not ‚Äùanother big IT corporation‚Äù‚Äî we encourage and support in-house entrepreneurs in developing their ideas into business actions.

Our flagship brand, Boss Revolution, offers Money Transfer, International Calling, and Mobile Top-Up services and supports IDT‚Äôs mission of enabling people to keep in touch and share resources with family and friends worldwide.

If you are here, it seems like you are interested, so let‚Äôs chat! üòâ

jobs_results.title: Flutter Developer
jobs_results.description:
On behalf of our client, a global leader in the production and distribution of a wide range of established nutritional supplements and cosmetic products, we are seeking experienced Flutter Developer to join their new IT Hub in Greece. The company's headquarters are located in Germany, with a subsidiary in Athens, and the IT teams work fully remotely from anywhere in Greece.

A day in the life of a 'Flutter Developer'

The company has developed two internal products: a web and a mobile application, through which it manages all its internal processes while also supporting its partner network, which consists of approximately 3,000 partners. The web application is built using Java/Spring Boot microservices and Angular, while the mobile application is developed with GO and Flutter, supporting both Android and iOS platforms. Based on your expertise in using Flutter, you will join one of the sub-teams, contributing to the development of the company‚Äôs products through the conception, design, and implementation of business solutions.

Your day-to-day
‚Ä¢ Conception, design and implementation of business solutions in the area of digital customer solutions for our sales partners
‚Ä¢ Development and support of iOS and Android applications with a high degree of innovation for our partners
‚Ä¢ Strategic planning and implementation of front-end development projects
‚Ä¢ Taking responsibility for the coordination and control of troubleshooting as part of incident management and ensuring the operation of the developed solutions of the developed solutions
‚Ä¢ Use and continuous optimization of agile development processes and corresponding tool stacks
‚Ä¢ Ensuring software quality by implementing unit tests, expanding End2End tests in test automation and the support of integration tests
‚Ä¢ Technical support in requirements management with regard to feasibility analyses, development and further development of systems
‚Ä¢ Designing data models, interfaces and authorization concepts with the system managers and specialist departments
‚Ä¢ Responsibility for results and realization of the desired solutions with a focus on the needs of the customers/stakeholders and compliance with the company processes (business process and data flow via the existing business applications)

Requirements
‚Ä¢ Completed studies in computer science, business informatics or comparable training
‚Ä¢ Knowledge in the conception and development of multi-tier software architectures in the Flutter/Dart environment
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of mobile development for Android and IOS
‚Ä¢ Knowledge in dealing with tools for collaboration in the development team (Git, Jira, Confluence, SonarQube) and automated deployment/integration of applications (CodeMagick, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes)
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of common and cloud databases such as Postgres, MySQL, Azure Cosmos DB
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of build management and continuous integration
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of the Microsoft Azure DevOps environment is a plus
‚Ä¢ Basic application-related knowledge of interfaces (REST, sockets) and protocols (AMQP, TCP, UDP) will be considered as an asset

Benefits

What‚Äôs in it for you

You will have the opportunity to work in a motivating and multicultural environment working on a global scale projects and using latest technologies. Additionally, you will enjoy the following benefits:
‚Ä¢ Attractive remuneration package plus performance related reward
‚Ä¢ Intellectually stimulating work environment
‚Ä¢ Customized training plan

jobs_results.title: Mobile Application Developer
jobs_results.description:
Job Code: MW-GR-MAD-05-2015

Office: Greece

MobiWeb is actively looking for Mobile Application Developers to join our Greek office. Job holders will join our Technical Department. They will be responsible for designing and creating mobile applications, web applications, service APIs as well as for maintenance and updates to current systems.

Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Knowledge in Computer Science (Bachelor / Master preferred).
‚Ä¢ Proven experience in Native Mobile Application Development (iOS, Android, Windows Phone, Objective C, Swift, Java, .NET).
‚Ä¢ Proven experience in Hybrid Mobile Application Development in any of the following (PhoneGap, Ionic, Sencha Touch, JQuery Mobile, Mobile Angular, Intel XDK).
‚Ä¢ Proven experience in databases in any of the following (MySQL, MariaDB, Oracle).
‚Ä¢ Excellent understanding of mobile application concepts.
‚Ä¢ Excellent understanding of object-oriented programming concepts.
‚Ä¢ Excellent command of English language.
‚Ä¢ Excellent communication skills (oral and written).
‚Ä¢ Interest to learn about the latest mobile technologies.
‚Ä¢ Passion and drive to learn, design and develop with new technologies.

This position requires strong programming skills with deep understanding of different technologies, analysis, problem solving, communication skills, being a team player and working with deadlines.

Full-time position. Competitive salary. Send your CVs with Job Code MW-GR-MAD-05-2015 at careers@solutions4mobiles.com.

jobs_results.title: Senior Mobile Cross-Platform Developer (Firebase)
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: EMEA

About us:

Talent has no borders. Proxify's mission is to connect top developers around the world with opportunities they deserve. So, it doesn't matter where you are; we are here to help you fast-track your independent career in the right direction. üôÇ

Since our launch, Proxify's developers have successfully worked with 1200+ happy clients to build their products and growth features. 3500+ talented developers trust Proxify and its network to fulfil their dreams and objectives.

Proxify is shaped by a global network of supportive, talented developers interested in remote full-time jobs. Our Glassdoor (4.5/5) and Trustpilot (4.8/5) ratings reflect the trust developers place in us and our commitment to our members' success.

The Role:

We are looking for a Senior Mobile Cross-platform Developer with strong proficiency with Firebase for one of our clients. You are a perfect candidate if you are growth-oriented, you love what you do, and you enjoy working on new ideas to develop exciting products.

What we‚Äôre looking for:
‚Ä¢ Minimum of 5 years of experience in mobile application development with a strong portfolio of released applications.
‚Ä¢ Extensive experience with Firebase services and integrations in mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in mobile development frameworks and languages such as Flutter, React Native, Swift, Kotlin, and Java.
‚Ä¢ Strong knowledge of testing frameworks and debugging tools for mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills with a proactive approach to identifying and resolving issues.

Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Design, develop, and maintain high-performance mobile applications for both iOS and Android platforms using Flutter, React Native, or native languages (Swift, Kotlin).
‚Ä¢ Implement and manage Firebase services such as Authentication, Firestore, Realtime Database, Cloud Functions, Cloud Messaging, and Crashlytics to enhance mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code with a focus on reusability and best practices. Conduct unit testing, integration testing, and end-to-end testing to ensure application stability and performance.
‚Ä¢ Identify and troubleshoot performance bottlenecks in mobile applications and optimise for maximum performance and user experience.

What Proxify offers
‚Ä¢ Career-accelerating positions at cutting-edge companies
‚Ä¢ Discover exclusive long-term remote engagements at the world's most interesting product companies.
‚Ä¢ Hand-picked opportunities, just for you
‚Ä¢ Skip the typical recruitment roadblocks and biases with personally matched engagements.
‚Ä¢ Fast-track your independent developer career
‚Ä¢ Start small and gain more freedom to take on new engagements as you build your independent developer career.
‚Ä¢ A recruitment process that values your time
‚Ä¢ Only one hiring process with the possibility of several positions, without any additional tests.

jobs_results.title: Junior Integration Support Engineer (Spring Boot / Quarkus / Android)
jobs_results.description:
Basic Information

We are seeking a motivated Junior Integration Support Engineer to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will provide technical support and assist with the integration of systems that power our Android applications and platforms. The ideal candidate will have basic programming skills, some experience with Spring Boot and Quarkus, and familiarity with Java/Kotlin development. Basic Android knowledge and understanding of networking concepts, as well as Linux system administration and SSH, are essential for successful integration and support.

Responsibilities
‚Ä¢ Assist in developing, maintaining, and integrating software solutions using Spring Boot, Quarkus, Java, and Kotlin.
‚Ä¢ Provide technical support for Android applications and contribute to backend system integration.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement integration strategies for various platforms.
‚Ä¢ Troubleshoot and assist in resolving technical issues related to Android apps, APIs, and network configurations.
‚Ä¢ Help develop and maintain support platforms and tools for application monitoring and issue resolution.
‚Ä¢ Support system integrations with third-party services and APIs.
‚Ä¢ Document technical procedures, system configurations, and integration workflows.
‚Ä¢ Assist with deployment and version management of Android applications and backend services.
‚Ä¢ Perform basic Linux system administration tasks, including SSH access and troubleshooting.

Benefits
‚Ä¢ Continuous education
‚Ä¢ Strong team spirit
‚Ä¢ Training

Basic Requirements
‚Ä¢ Basic proficiency in Java and Kotlin programming languages.
‚Ä¢ Some experience with Spring Boot and Quarkus for backend development.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with Android development and application integration.
‚Ä¢ Understanding of RESTful APIs, JSON, and other integration protocols.
‚Ä¢ Basic knowledge of networking principles, including IP configurations and troubleshooting.
‚Ä¢ Exposure to Linux system administration and SSH.
‚Ä¢ Exposure to version control systems (e.g., Git) and CI/CD pipelines.
‚Ä¢ Good problem-solving skills and a willingness to learn and grow.
‚Ä¢ Strong communication skills and attention to detail.

Good to Have
‚Ä¢ Exposure to containerization (Docker/Kubernetes) and cloud platforms.
‚Ä¢ Interest in IoT integrations and mobile device management.
‚Ä¢ Basic knowledge of databases (SQL/NoSQL) and ORM frameworks.
‚Ä¢ Prior experience in a technical support or integration role is a plus.
